\begin{attribution}
graebe (2013-12-25)
\end{attribution}

\end{document}


outerFuenfeck(M,r):= 
  makelist(M+[r*sin(i*2*%pi/5), r*cos(i*2*%pi/5)],i,0,4);

innerFuenfeck(M,r):= block([s:-r*(3-sqrt(5))/2], 
  makelist(M+[s*sin(i*2*%pi/5), s*cos(i*2*%pi/5)],i,0,4)
);

plotFuenfeck(u):=
  polygon(makelist(part(u,mod(2*i,5)+1),i,1,6));

pslineFuenfeck(u):=block([l0,l1,l2],
  l0:float(u),
  l1:makelist(part(l0,mod(2*i,5)+1),i,1,6),
  l2:apply(concat,map(lambda([v],concat("(",v[1],",",v[2],")")),l1)),
  concat("\\psline{-}",l2,newline)
);

f:outerFuenfeck([0,0],1);
s:1/3;
f1:map(lambda([u],outerFuenfeck(u,s)),f)$
f2:apply(append,map(lambda([v],
   map(lambda([u],outerFuenfeck(u,s^2)),v)),f1))$

load(draw)$
set_draw_defaults( transparent=true,
xrange = [-2,2], yrange = [-2, 2], color = blue, grid = true)$

draw2d(color = blue, plotFuenfeck(f),color = red, map(plotFuenfeck,f1),
color = yellow, map(plotFuenfeck,f2));

out:openw("file.txt");
o1:concat(pslineFuenfeck(f),"/* --------- */",newline,
  apply(concat,map(pslineFuenfeck,f1)),"/* --------- */",newline,
  apply(concat,map(pslineFuenfeck,f2))
)$
printf(out,"~a",o1);
close(out);
